phrs.translation: 线路输出, 列队争球, 线路电压输出, 边线发球

sentences.sentence: New Zealand have always had a good lineout, so Australia will have to compete aggressively.
sentences.translation: 新西兰队在界外球争夺中一直很出色，所有澳大利亚队需要英勇厮杀。

sentences.sentence: Also the name of a player in a lineout, usually at the 2,4, and 6 positions, jumping to chatch or intercept the throw.
sentences.translation: 第二种是指界外球中的跳手，通常在2/4/6号点起跳来干扰或获得投球。
